sentences.chinese: 項王謂其騎曰：「吾為公取彼一將。」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang said to his riders: 'I for you take that one general.'
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu said to his riders: "I will capture a general for you."

sentences.chinese: 令四面騎馳下，期山東為三處。
sentences.literal: Ordered four sides riders gallop down, agreed east mountain as three places.
sentences.idiomatic: He ordered riders to gallop down from all four sides, dividing to meet at three places east of the mountain.

sentences.chinese: 於是項王大呼馳下，漢軍皆披靡，遂斬漢一將。
sentences.literal: Therefore Xiang Wang great shout galloped down, Han army all scattered, then beheaded Han one general.

sentences.chinese: 是時，赤泉侯為騎將，追項王，項王瞋目而叱之，赤泉侯人馬俱驚，辟易數里與其騎會為三處。
sentences.literal: At this time, Chiquan Hou was cavalry general, pursued Xiang Wang, Xiang Wang glared eyes berated him, Chiquan Hou person horse both startled, retreated several li with his riders assembled as three places.
sentences.idiomatic: He captured a Han general alive.

sentences.chinese: 漢軍不知項王所在，乃分軍為三，復圍之。
sentences.literal: Han army not know Xiang Wang location, then divided army into three, again surrounded them.
sentences.idiomatic: He returned and showed him to the riders.

sentences.chinese: 項王乃馳，復斬漢一都尉，殺數十百人，復聚其騎，亡其兩騎耳。
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang then galloped, again beheaded Han one commandery captain, killed several ten hundred people, again gathered his riders, lost his two riders only.

sentences.chinese: 乃謂其騎曰：「何如？」
sentences.literal: He then said to his riders: 'How is it?'
sentences.idiomatic: They said: "Our king is still mighty!"

sentences.chinese: 騎皆伏曰：「如大王言。」
sentences.literal: The riders all submitted and said: 'As the great king said.'

sentences.chinese: 於是項王乃欲東渡烏江。
sentences.literal: Therefore Xiang Wang then wished east cross Wujiang.

sentences.chinese: 烏江亭長檥船待，謂項王曰：「江東雖小，地方千里，眾數十萬人，亦足王也。
sentences.literal: Wujiang pavilion chief moored boat waited, said to Xiang Wang: 'Jiangdong though small, territory thousand li, multitude several ten ten thousand people, also sufficient king.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu returned to the camp.

sentences.chinese: 願大王急渡。
sentences.literal: Wish great king urgently cross.
sentences.idiomatic: He divided the meat and wine.

sentences.chinese: 今獨臣有船，漢軍至，無以渡。」
sentences.literal: Now only minister has boat, Han army arrives, nothing to cross.'
sentences.idiomatic: He said: "This is my last feast with you."

sentences.chinese: 項王笑曰：「天之亡我，我何渡為！
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang laughed said: 'Heaven destroys me, I what cross for!

sentences.chinese: 且籍與江東子弟八千人渡江而西，今無一人還，縱江東父兄憐而王我，我何面目見之？
sentences.literal: Moreover Ji with Jiangdong sons eight thousand crossed river west, now none one returns, even if Jiangdong fathers elders pity king me, I what face see them?
sentences.idiomatic: They knew they could not escape.

sentences.chinese: 縱彼不言，籍獨不愧於心乎？」
sentences.literal: Even if they not speak, Ji alone not ashamed in heart?'
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu said: "I have lived for thirty years.

sentences.chinese: 乃謂亭長曰：「吾知公長者。
sentences.literal: Then said to pavilion chief: 'I know you elder.

sentences.chinese: 吾騎此馬五歲，所當無敵，嘗一日行千里，不忍殺之，以賜公。」
sentences.literal: I rode this horse five years, what faced no enemy, once one day traveled thousand li, not bear kill it, to bestow you.'
sentences.idiomatic: But today I am trapped here.

sentences.chinese: 乃令騎皆下馬步行，持短兵接戰。
sentences.literal: Then ordered riders all dismount walk, hold short weapons close battle.

sentences.chinese: 獨籍所殺漢軍數百人。
sentences.literal: Alone Ji what killed Han army several hundred people.
sentences.idiomatic: I will fight to the death."

sentences.chinese: 項王身亦被十餘創。
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang body also suffered ten more wounds.

sentences.chinese: 顧見漢騎司馬呂馬童，曰：「若非吾故人乎？」
sentences.literal: Looked back saw Han cavalry adjutant Lu Matong, said: 'Are you not my old friend?'
sentences.idiomatic: "The force of the wind rises, the clouds fly up.

sentences.chinese: 馬童面之，指王翳曰：「此項王也。」
sentences.literal: Matong faced him, pointed to Wang Yi said: 'This is Xiang Wang.'
sentences.idiomatic: When my might is exhausted, I cannot return home.

sentences.chinese: 項王乃曰：「吾聞漢購我頭千金，邑萬戶，吾為若德。」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang then said: 'I heard Han offers my head thousand gold, fief ten thousand households, I for you virtue.'
sentences.idiomatic: When my might is exhausted, I cannot return home."

sentences.chinese: 乃自刎而死。
sentences.literal: Then self cut throat and died.

sentences.chinese: 王翳取其頭，餘騎相蹂踐爭項王，相殺者數十人。
sentences.literal: Wang Yi took his head, remaining riders mutually trampled contended Xiang Wang, mutually killed several ten people.

sentences.chinese: 最其後，郎中騎楊喜，騎司馬呂馬童，郎中呂勝、楊武各得其一體。
sentences.literal: Finally, court gentleman rider Yang Xi, cavalry adjutant Lu Matong, court gentleman Lu Sheng, Yang Wu each got one part.

sentences.chinese: 五人共會其體，皆是。
sentences.literal: Five people together assembled his body, all correct.
sentences.idiomatic: He led his close followers, about eighty riders.

sentences.chinese: 故分其地為五：封呂馬童為中水侯，封王翳為杜衍侯，封楊喜為赤泉侯，封楊武為吳防侯，封呂勝為涅陽侯。
sentences.literal: Therefore divided his lands into five: enfeoffed Lu Matong as Zhongshui Hou, enfeoffed Wang Yi as Duyan Hou, enfeoffed Yang Xi as Chiquan Hou, enfeoffed Yang Wu as Wufang Hou, enfeoffed Lu Sheng as Nieyang Hou.

sentences.chinese: 項王已死，楚地皆降漢，獨魯不下。
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang already dead, Chu lands all surrendered Han, only Lu not submitted.

sentences.chinese: 漢乃引天下兵欲屠之，為其守禮義，為主死節，乃持項王頭視魯，魯父兄乃降。
sentences.literal: Han then led world troops wished slaughter them, because they guarded rites righteousness, for lord died loyalty, then held Xiang Wang head showed Lu, Lu fathers elders then surrendered.

sentences.chinese: 始，楚懷王初封項籍為魯公，及其死，魯最後下，故以魯公禮葬項王穀城。
sentences.literal: Beginning, Chu Huai Wang initially enfeoffed Xiang Ji as Lu Gong, and his death, Lu last submitted, therefore with Lu Gong rites buried Xiang Wang Gucheng.
sentences.idiomatic: The Wujiang commander blocked the bridge.

sentences.chinese: 漢王為發哀，泣之而去。
sentences.literal: Han Wang for him issued mourning, wept and left.
sentences.idiomatic: He said: "The Chu king cannot cross."

sentences.chinese: 諸項氏枝屬，漢王皆不誅。
sentences.literal: Various Xiang clan branches relatives, Han Wang all not executed.

sentences.chinese: 乃封項伯為射陽侯。
sentences.literal: Then enfeoffed Xiang Bo as Sheyang Hou.

sentences.chinese: 桃侯、平皋侯、玄武侯皆項氏，賜姓劉。
sentences.literal: Tao Hou, Pinggao Hou, Xuanwu Hou all Xiang clan, granted surname Liu.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：吾聞之周生曰「舜目蓋重瞳子」，又聞項羽亦重瞳子。
sentences.literal: Grand Scribe said: I heard from Zhou Sheng said 'Shun eyes probably double pupil', again heard Xiang Yu also double pupil.

sentences.chinese: 羽豈其苗裔邪？
sentences.literal: Yu perhaps his descendants?

sentences.chinese: 何興之暴也！
sentences.literal: What rise so fierce!

sentences.chinese: 夫秦失其政，陳涉首難，豪傑蜂起，相與并爭，不可勝數。
sentences.literal: Now Qin lost its governance, Chen She first rebelled, heroes swarmed rise, mutually united contended, cannot count.

sentences.chinese: 然羽非有尺寸，乘執起隴畝之中，三年，遂將五諸侯滅秦，分裂天下，而封王侯，政由羽出，號為「霸王」，位雖不終，近古以來未嘗有也。
sentences.literal: Yet Yu not had inch, rode plow rose fields middle, three years, then led five feudal lords extinguished Qin, split world, and enfeoffed kings marquises, government from Yu out, titled 'Hegemon King', position though not ended, near ancient since never had.

sentences.chinese: 及羽背關懷楚，放逐義帝而自立，怨王侯叛己，難矣。
sentences.literal: When Yu turned against passes longed Chu, banished Righteous Emperor and self established, resented kings marquises rebelled him, difficult.

sentences.chinese: 自矜功伐，奮其私智而不師古，謂霸王之業，欲以力征經營天下，五年卒亡其國，身死東城，尚不覺寤而不自責，過矣。
sentences.literal: Self boasted merit achievements, exerted his private wisdom and not followed ancient, considered hegemon king enterprise, wished with force conquest managed world, five years finally perished his state, body died Dongcheng, still not aware awoke and not self blamed, mistake.

sentences.chinese: 乃引「天亡我，非用兵之罪也」，豈不謬哉！
sentences.literal: Then cited 'Heaven destroys me, not using troops crime', how not mistaken!
sentences.idiomatic: He was a hero among men."
